ComicInfo.Summary:
The improbable has become the impossible! With magician Harry Houdini arrested after a blood bath that has left his wife at the edge of death, detective Sherlock Holmes must overcome his suspicions – and his demons – to free Houdini and overcome a powerful enemy that commands the unholy powers of the spirits.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Campbell | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Colton Worley | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-10 11:26:21. [CVDB480691]
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Joseph Rybandt, Molly Mahan
ComicInfo.Characters: Harry Houdini, Inspector Lestrade, Sherlock Holmes
